00031 class GulpMD_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00032     
00033     def setUp(self):
00034         """do argon"""
00035         argonConfiguration = file(molDynamicsHome+sep+'molDynamics'+sep+\
00036                                   'tests'+sep+'gulpTests'+sep+'argon.conf')
00037         lx, ly, lz = map(string.atof, string.split(argonConfiguration.readline()))
00038         self.samplesample = Sample()
00039         self.samplesample.unitCell = [[lx, 0.0, 0.0], [0.0, ly, 0.0], [0.0, 0.0, lz]]
00040         atoms = []
00041         while 1:
00042             line = argonConfiguration.readline()
00043             if not line: break
00044             x, y, z = map(string.atof, string.split(line))
00045             atoms.append(['Ar', x, y, z])
00046         self.samplesample.atoms = atoms
00047         self.samplesample.initialTemp = 300.0
00048         twoAtom=TwoAtomPotential('Ar','Ar')
00049         twoAtom.assignInteraction('lennardJonesMmtk')
00050         #self.sample.forcefieldParameters = twoAtom.getPotential('lennardJonesMmtk')
00051         self.samplesample.forcefields=[]
00052         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(twoAtom)
00053 
00054     def testGulpNVE(self):
00055         md = Gulp()
00056         md.i.sample=self.samplesample
00057         md.i.executablePath='/home/brandon/gulp3.0/Src/gulp'
00058         md.i.ensemble = 'nve'
00059         md.i.timestep = 0.5
00060         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.0001
00061         md.i.productionTime = 0.001
00062         md.i.inputDeck='argonNVE.gin'
00063         md.i.trajectoryFilename='argonNVE.xyz'
00064         md.i.logFilename='argonNVE.log'
00065         md.integrate()
00066 
00067     def testGulpNVT(self):
00068         self.samplesample.temperature=200.0
00069         md = Gulp()
00070         md.i.sample=self.samplesample
00071         md.i.ensemble = 'nvt'
00072         md.i.timestep = 0.5
00073         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.0
00074         md.i.productionTime = 0.001
00075         md.i.inputDeck='argonNVT.gin'
00076         md.i.trajectoryFilename='argonNVT.xyz'
00077         md.i.logFilename='argonNVT.log'
00078         md.integrate()
00079         
00080     def testGulpNPT(self):
00081         self.samplesample.temperature=300.0
00082         self.samplesample.pressure=0.0001 # 1 atm in GPa
00083         md = Gulp()
00084         md.i.sample=self.samplesample
00085         md.i.ensemble='npt'
00086         md.i.timestep=0.5
00087         md.i.equilibrationTime=0.0
00088         md.i.productionTime=0.001
00089         md.i.inputDeck='argonNPT.gin'
00090         md.i.trajectoryFilename='argonNPT.xyz'
00091         md.i.logFilename='argonNPT.log'
00092         md.integrate()

00094 class GulpOpt_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00095     
00096     def setUp(self):
00097         """do tiO2 unit cell"""
00098         self.samplesample = Sample()
00099         self.samplesample.unitCell = [[4.58666, 0.0, 0.0], 
00100                                 [0.0, 4.58666, 0.0], 
00101                                 [0.0, 0.0, 2.95407]]
00102         atoms=[['Ti', 0.0, 0.0, 0.0],
00103         ['Ti', 2.29333,     2.29333,     1.477035],
00104         ['O',  1.397509435, 1.397509435, 0.0],
00105         ['O',  3.189150565, 3.189150565, 0.0],
00106         ['O',  3.690839435, .8958205646, 1.477035000],
00107         ['O',  .8958205646, 3.690839435, 1.477035000]]
00108         self.samplesample.atoms = atoms
00109         self.samplesample.initialTemp = 300.0
00110         twoAtomTiO=TwoAtomPotential('Ti','O')
00111         twoAtomTiO.assignInteraction('buckinghamEx23')
00112         twoAtomOO=TwoAtomPotential('O','O')
00113         twoAtomOO.assignInteraction('buckinghamEx23')
00114         #self.sample.forcefieldParameters = twoAtom.getPotential('lennardJonesMmtk')
00115         self.samplesample.forcefields=[]
00116         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(twoAtomTiO)
00117         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(twoAtomOO)
00118         
00119     def testOpt(self):
00120         opt = Gulp()
00121         opt.i.sample =self.samplesample
00122         opt.i.inputDeck='tio2Opt.gin'
00123         opt.i.trajectoryFilename='tio2Opt.xyz'
00124         opt.i.logFilename='tio2Opt.log'
00125         opt.optimize()
00126 
00127     def testOptConstantVolume(self):
00128         opt = Gulp()
00129         opt.i.sample=self.samplesample
00130         opt.i.constantVolumeOptimize=True
00131         opt.i.inputDeck='tio2OptConV.gin'
00132         opt.i.trajectoryFilename='tio2OptConV.xyz'
00133         opt.i.logFilename='tio2OptConV.log'
00134         opt.optimize()
00135

00140         opt.i.inputDeck='tio2OptConP.gin'

00145 class GulpRestart_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00146     
00147     def setUp(self):
00148         """do argon"""
00149         argonConfiguration = file(danseGlob.installDir+sep+'molDynamics'+sep+\
00150                                   'tests'+sep+'gulpTests'+sep+'argon.conf')
00151         lx, ly, lz = map(string.atof, string.split(argonConfiguration.readline()))
00152         self.samplesample = Sample()
00153         self.samplesample.unitCell = [[lx, 0.0, 0.0], [0.0, ly, 0.0], [0.0, 0.0, lz]]
00154         atoms = []
00155         while 1:
00156             line = argonConfiguration.readline()
00157             if not line: break
00158             x, y, z = map(string.atof, string.split(line))
00159             atoms.append(['Ar', x, y, z])
00160         self.samplesample.atoms = atoms
00161         self.samplesample.initialTemp = 300.0
00162         twoAtom=TwoAtomPotential('Ar','Ar')
00163         twoAtom.assignInteraction('lennardJonesMmtk')
00164         #self.sample.forcefieldParameters = twoAtom.getPotential('lennardJonesMmtk')
00165         self.samplesample.forcefields=[]
00166         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(twoAtom)
00167         
00168     def testRestart(self):
00169         # first do a short md run
00170         md = Gulp()
00171         md.i.sample=self.samplesample
00172         md.i.ensemble = 'nve'
00173         md.i.timestep = 0.5
00174         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.0001
00175         md.i.productionTime = 0.001
00176         md.i.inputDeck='shortArgonNVE.gin'
00177         md.i.trajectoryFilename='shortArgonNVE.xyz'
00178         md.i.logFilename='shortArgonNVE.log'
00179         md.i.restartFilename='shortArgonNVE.res'
00180         md.integrate()
00181         # restart from it
00182         restartMd = Gulp()
00183         restartMd.i.sample = self.samplesample
00184         restartMd.i.inputDeck='shortArgonNVE.res'
00185         restartMd.i.logFilename='shortArgonNVE.log'
00186         restartMd.restartIntegrate()
00187

00189 class GulpFit_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00190     
00191     def setUp(self):
00192         """do tiO2 unit cell"""
00193         self.samplesample = Sample()
00194         self.samplesample.unitCell = [[4.58666, 0.0, 0.0], 
00195                                 [0.0, 4.58666, 0.0], 
00196                                 [0.0, 0.0, 2.95407]]
00197         atoms=[['Ti', 0.0, 0.0, 0.0],
00198         ['Ti', 2.29333,     2.29333,     1.477035],
00199         ['O',  1.397509435, 1.397509435, 0.0],
00200         ['O',  3.189150565, 3.189150565, 0.0],
00201         ['O',  3.690839435, .8958205646, 1.477035000],
00202         ['O',  .8958205646, 3.690839435, 1.477035000]]
00203         self.samplesample.atoms = atoms
00204         self.samplesample.initialTemp = 300.0*Units.K
00205         twoAtomTiO=TwoAtomPotential('Ti','O')
00206         twoAtomTiO.assignInteraction('buckinghamEx23')
00207         twoAtomTiO.i.AFit=False
00208         twoAtomTiO.i.rhoFit=True
00209         twoAtomTiO.i.AFit=False
00210         twoAtomOO=TwoAtomPotential('O','O')
00211         twoAtomOO.assignInteraction('buckinghamEx23')
00212         #self.sample.forcefieldParameters = twoAtom.getPotential('lennardJonesMmtk')
00213         self.samplesample.forcefields=[]
00214         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(twoAtomTiO)
00215         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(twoAtomOO)
00216         
00217     def testFit(self):
00218         fit = Gulp()
00219         fit.i.sample=self.samplesample
00220         fit.i.inputDeck='tio2Fit.gin'
00221         fit.i.trajectoryFilename='tio2Fit.xyz'
00222         fit.i.logFilename='tio2Fit.log'
00223         fit.fit()
00224 
00225     def testFitConstantVolume(self):
